amendment.description: To provide a 1 year extension of essential air service to an airport whose eligibility was terminated due to the impact of decreased air travel.

vote.text: Amendment SA 910 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 910 proposed by Senator Hollings for Senator Jeffords. (consideration: CR S7804; text: CR S7804) To provide a 1 year extension of essential air service to an airport whose eligibility was terminated due to the impact of decreased air travel.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 910 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 910 proposed by Senator Hollings for Senator Jeffords.
